1.name: The Birth of a Nation
1.description: The Stoneman family finds its friendship with the Camerons affected by the Civil War, both fighting in opposite armies. The development of the war in their lives plays through to Lincoln's assassination and the birth of the Ku Klux Klan.

2.name: Der Golem
2.description: In this version of the golem legend, the golem, a clay statue brought to life by Rabbi Loew in 16th century Prague to save the Jews from the ongoing brutal persecution by the city's rulers,...                See full summary »

3.name: Les vampires
3.description: An intrepid reporter and his loyal friend battle a bizarre secret society of criminals known as The Vampires.

4.name: Fanchon, the Cricket
4.description: A young wild girl Fanchon ( Mary Pickford ) lives in a forest with her eccentric grandmother who is suspected by the villagers of being a witch. The unkempt Fanchon suffers from her ...                See full summary »

5.name: The Cheat
5.description: A venal, spoiled stockbroker's wife impulsively embezzles $10,000 from the charity she chairs and desperately turns to a Burmese ivory trader to replace the stolen money.

6.name: A Fool There Was
6.description: A married diplomat falls hopelessly under the spell of a predatory woman.

7.name: Alice in Wonderland
7.description: Alice goes with her sister to a picnic and then she falls asleep and starts dreaming about a wonderland full of talking animals and walking playing cards.

8.name: Carmen
8.description: In order to help her smuggler kinsmen, a sultry gypsy seduces and corrupts an officer of the Civil Guard turning him into a traitor and murderer.

9.name: The Regeneration
9.description: A boy surrounded by violence grows up to become an infamous gangster.

10.name: Hypocrites
10.description: The parallel stories of a modern preacher and a medieval monk, Gabriel the Ascetic, who is killed by an ignorant mob for making a nude statue representing Truth, which is also represented by a ghostly naked girl who flits throughout the film.

11.name: Civilization
11.description: Christ takes on the form of a pacifist count to end a senseless war.

14.name: The Lamb
14.description: Gerald, the somewhat frail son of a wealthy New York family, is bested at the beach by Bill, a strapping young cowboy from Arizona. His fiancée Mary, ashamed of Gerald's "yellow streak", ...                See full summary »

15.name: Assunta Spina
15.description: Assunta Spina is a tragedy set in Naples at the beginning of the twentieth century. Assunta and Michele are in love but others come between them and there is much jealousy. They fight and ...                See full summary »

16.name: The Girl of the Golden West
16.description: Road agent Ramerrez hides out in his girlfriend's store where the Sheriff knows him to be. The Sheriff plays The Girl a game of cards to decide Ramerrez's future. She wins. She later saves him from a hanging. She rides off with him.

17.name: The Heart of the Blue Ridge

18.name: Filibus
18.description: Skypirate Filibus commits robberies from her airship, while a dedicated detective attempts to put a stop to it.

19.name: Voyna i mir
19.description: Napoleon's tumultuous relations with Russia including his disastrous 1812 invasion serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of five aristocratic Russian families.

20.name: Life Without Soul
20.description: A young man gives life to a statue with disastrous results.

21.name: Inspiration
21.description: A young sculptor searches for the perfect model to inspire his work.

22.name: Madame Butterfly
22.description: The story of a Japanese woman and the tragedy that ensues when she loves an American naval officer.

23.name: The Golden Chance
23.description: Mary Denby becomes a seamstress after her husband Steve wastes their money on booze. Her employer provides her as an escort to accompany millionaire Roger Manning. Her husband tries ...                See full summary »

24.name: Trilby
24.description: A hypnotic Svengali controls the singing voice of a young starlet, but he cannot control her heart.

25.name: The Italian
25.description: An immigrant leaves his sweetheart in Italy to find a better life across the sea in the grimy slums of New York. They are eventually reunited and marry. But life in New York is hard and ...                See full summary »

26.name: On the Night Stage
26.description: A stagecoach robber falls in love with a saloon girl. However, she falls for a pastor, who converts her; she marries him. The robber is so impressed by this that he decides to turn over a ...                See full summary »

27.name: Maciste
27.description: A young girl, pursued by a band of conspirators, hides in a movie theatre where she watches the film Cabiria. She determines to seek the aid of that film's strongman, Maciste. When she ...                See full summary »

28.name: The Dictator
28.description: Brooke Travers, a young society man of a roving disposition and much leisure, gets into a cab with his valet and his trunks, to go to his yacht for a cruise. Arriving at the pier, the ...                See full summary »

29.name: A tolonc
29.description: Betty (Lili Berky, Duel For Nothing), a young woman living in the country, is told by her dying father that he is really her uncle and raised her as his own when her mother was sent to ...                See full summary »

30.name: Havsgamar
30.description: A man and his adult son are caught smuggling by a customs officer, who dies in the ensuing struggle. The arrival of the dead officer's son sets a whole new chain of events in motion.

33.name: Far from the Madding Crowd
33.description: A girl farmer weds a faithless sergeant who is killed by her suitor, and realises she loves the bailiff.

34.name: The Warrens of Virginia
34.description: As the Civil War begins Ned Burton leaves his Southern love Agatha Warren and joins the Union army. He is later protected and saved from death by Agatha in spite of her loyalty to the South.

35.name: Carmen
35.description: A Spanish soldier falls under the spell of a fiery gypsy girl named Carmen. His obsession with her leads to his ruin.

36.name: Ghosts
36.description: Helen and Manders are in love and wish to marry. Her parents object to his poverty and want her to marry Alving, a notorious rake, who is wealthy and powerful. Manders protests. The family ...                See full summary »

37.name: The Red Circle
37.description: The Red Circle is a birthmark, on the hand of the heroine, noticeable only in times of stress and excitement, which forces her to steal, leading to no end of complications and intrigue.

38.name: Peer Gynt
38.description: A fantasy from Ibsen's verse drama. Ne'er-do-well and braggart Peer Gynt has many adventures in varied countries, making and losing money, gaining fortune at others' expense, until he finds...                See full summary »

39.name: The Goddess
39.description: A young girl is reared on a desert island by natives and led to believe that she is a goddess. One day an outsider comes to the island, and persuades her to accompany him to preach about ...                See full summary »

40.name: The Arab
40.description: An old sheik punishes his son Jamil for robbing a caravan by giving his horse to the wronged merchant. The horse is sold to a Turkish general then given to a Christian missionary Mary ...                See full summary »

41.name: The Diamond from the Sky
41.description: This serial told the story of the diamond heir loom of the Stanley family.

42.name: The Captive
42.description: With her brother killed Sonya is given Turkish captive Mahmud to do the hard work on the farm. After they become fond of each other he strikes a Turkish officer. When peace arrives, his ...                See full summary »

43.name: The Prince and the Pauper
43.description: A poor boy named Tom Canty and Edward, the Prince of Wales exchange identities but events force the pair to experience each other's lives as well.

44.name: Martyrs of the Alamo
44.description: The story of the defense of the mission-turned-fortress by 185 Texans against an overwhelming Mexican army in 1836.

48.name: Aloha Oe
48.description: Brilliant but besotted attorney, David Harmon, wins a big case but ends the day in a dingy waterfront flophouse. His fiancée puts him on a sailing ship in an attempt to get him to dry out, ...                See full summary »

49.name: The Devil's Daughter
49.description: When her lover deserts her, Gioconda Dianti seeks revenge by wrecking the lives of other men. When Lucio Settala, a famous sculptor, meets Gioconda and asks her to pose for him, she sets ...                See full summary »
